abstract: "I had a bit of an acne problem before I joined the army but it got really bad when they sent me to the tropics."
description: Keith Payne had a terrible acne problem when he was a youngster but it only got worse when he was deployed into the tropics. Unfortunately for Payne, his attempts to sign up to volunteer in Japan were shot down when the doctors looked at his acne and sent him home.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
